word:
Christ has given a parable [see Luke 14:16-24] in regard to the manner in which men and women receive the gospel invitation. "A certain man." He said, "made a great supper, and bade many: and sent his servant at supper time to say 


                                   -246- 

to them that were bidden, Come; for all things are now ready. And they all with one consent began to make excuse.
